channel.desc: Whether its sports, esports, UCI, Ironman, F1, WRC, TV, music, festivals, films or videos, Red Bull TV has it all!

programme.title: My Other Life
programme.desc: Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist – and what lesson he learned from snowboarding to dare the leap into creative arts.
programme.series-desc: Witness Danny Larsen's trajectory from pro snowboarder to illustration artist.

programme.title: My Other Life
programme.desc: Swedish Eve Sandelgard is a triple extreme snowboarding world champion and an haute couture hairdresser. Hear the story of her double life, from first female descents down Mont Blanc, France and Denali (Mt McKinley), Alaska to Paris Fashion Week.
programme.series-desc: The Swedish freerider talks about the thrills of extreme snowboarding and dressing hair at Paris Fashion Week.

programme.title: 24 hours with Kiddy Smile
programme.desc: Kiddy Smile is first and foremost a one-of-a-kind character. The performer plays around with his musical and physical identities, mixing genres and influences. With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy is set to take centre stage.
programme.series-desc: With the release of his debut album, One Trick Pony, Kiddy Smile is set to take centre stage.

programme.title: 4 Waves 1 Hour
programme.sub-title: The story of Mick Fanning's 2013 ASP title
programme.desc: The 2013 ASP World Championship was a battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning that all came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats. Mick's journey to the title is narrated by the man himself in an intimate and dramatic look at his win.
programme.series-desc: A battle between Kelly Slater and Mick Fanning came down to just four waves in two 30-minute heats.

programme.title: Chasing Summer
programme.desc: After waking up in the gorgeous Scorpion Bay, Mexico, with some relaxing paddle boarding, Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody head through the salt flats to the lush oasis of San Ignacio, Belize, then into the deep fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico.
programme.series-desc: Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody cross the salt flats into the heavy fog of Guerrero Negro, Mexico.

programme.title: Chasing Summer
programme.sub-title: We Live It, Love It, and Pin It!
programme.desc: Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman leave the foggy coast and head north into the hot and dry Baja interior, tearing up some sand dunes along the way. After navigating a dangerous route, the duo returns to the original roadside market where the trip began.
programme.series-desc: Leaving the foggy coast behind, Quinn Cody and Kendall Norman head into the Baja interior to ride sand dunes.

programme.title: Chasing Summer
programme.desc: As their epic journey comes to a close, it's time for Kendall Norman and Quinn Cody to get back to business. The task at hand: defending their champion status in the legendary Baja 1000, a 1,000-mile nonstop race across the Baja California peninsula.
programme.series-desc: Kendall Norman’s and Quinn Cody's epic adventure wraps up in time for them to defend their Baja 1000 titles.

programme.title: Days of My Youth
programme.desc: The feeling of eternal youth that skiers get from doing what they love is the central theme of this two-year project from Matchstick Productions. Starring some of the most progressive skiers, this film shows the trials and triumphs of being the best.
programme.series-desc: Matchstick Productions' two-year project follows top skiers around the world chasing what they love: snow.

programme.title: Bomba Beach
programme.desc: Hosts Niki Awandee and Niek Traa connect with Puerto Rican locals to become their students, learn about the bomba dance style and its culture, and integrate them into their own style. Will they be able to live up to their teachers’ expectations?
programme.series-desc: Two young hip-hop strutters travel to Puerto Rico to explore the bomba dance style and the culture around it.

programme.title: MX World
programme.desc: As the 2019 MX campaign begins, there are contrasting fortunes for Jeffrey Herlings, Tom Vialle, Jorge Prado and Toni Cairoli. Find out how the season starts for each rider.
programme.series-desc: Go behind the scenes with motocross's top riders at the start of the 2019 season.

programme.title: Mates in Alaska
programme.desc: When the weather doesn't cooperate for snowboarding, it's time to find other distractions. Jake and Roland spend a down day hanging out with some wolves, playing disc golf, riding old snowmobiles, and having a good-old fashioned Alaskan bonfire.
programme.series-desc: The snowboarding mates spend a day meeting the wildlife, playing disc golf, and racing vintage snowmobiles.

programme.title: Mates in Alaska
programme.desc: Snowboarders Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska doing what they came to do: ride epic terrain. The last lines of the trip confirm what they always suspected – that this was going to be a life-changing experience for them and their crew.
programme.series-desc: It's last call for snowfall as Jake and Roland spend their last days in Alaska riding as much as they can.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.sub-title: From a hotel to a yurt
programme.desc: A group of skateboarders travel to Uzbekistan seeking adventure, from jumping into rivers, to getting familiar with the local metro and finding undiscovered skate spots the country has to offer.
programme.series-desc: Vladik Scholz, Rob Wootton, Ethan Loy and Pasha Kuznetsov travel to Uzbekistan seeking adventure.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.desc: The crew head west on a train to explore a new part of Uzbekistan and see what skate spots it has to offer. As they get to their next location they step into a whole new culture.
programme.series-desc: The crew head west on a train to explore a new part of Uzbekistan and see what skate spots it has to offer.

programme.title: Hotel Uzbekistan
programme.desc: From attempting a heart-pounding new trick, to riding camels and sleeping in a yurt, the skate crew continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan.
programme.series-desc: The guys continue to find once-in-a-lifetime adventure on their journey through Uzbekistan.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe takes you on a tour of Italy's third largest city, Naples – the home of pizza and the capital of traditional Italian music. Join Hubertus as he explores Naples's art and culture.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe is your guide to the Italian city of Naples.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores a one-of-a-kind hotel room, tries the local cuisine, checks out a new neighbourhood and much more.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe hits the city of Amsterdam, the Netherlands, in style as he explores the trendy city.

programme.title: Don't Crack Under Pressure
programme.desc: Whether it's freeriding the steepest mountains, freediving the depths of the ocean or wingsuit flying over uncharted territory, the pressure for extreme athletes to perform is a force stronger than gravity. When the time comes, will they crumble?
programme.series-desc: A team of extreme athletes embark on a quest to perform perilous feats in challenging conditions.

programme.title: Crossing Corsica
programme.desc: French ultrarunner and winemaker François d’Haene attempts to cross Corsica from north to south along the legendary 180km-long GR20 mountain trail in world record-breaking time – under 31 hours and 6 minutes.
programme.series-desc: Ultrarunner François d’Haene attempts to break the record for running the 180km GR20 trail.

programme.title: In House
programme.sub-title: The road to Volcom Pipe Pro
programme.desc: The Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up. As much as they can plan and prepare for the event, they can't control the Banzai Pipeline, Hawaii's legendary surf reef break.
programme.series-desc: In Hawaii, the two Volcom Houses prepare for Volcom Pipe Pro as the wind picks up.

programme.title: Epecuén
programme.desc: Tragedy struck the town of Epecuén 25 years ago when rains flooded the streets. Now, Danny MacAskill hops on his trials bike to explore the lost Argentinian town, which has been submerged for the majority of time since.
programme.series-desc: Danny MacAskill explores the lost Argentinian town that has been submerged for most of the past 25 years.

programme.title: Follow the Fraser
programme.sub-title: A mountain bike excursion into the unknown
programme.desc: Three star mountain bikers follow the Fraser River north through Canada, building and riding features along the way. Their trek takes them past their hometowns towards unridden territory and an unknown destination that holds a secret.
programme.series-desc: Three professional mountain bikers travel north through Canada, riding their way toward the unknown.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.sub-title: The past, present and future of snowboarding
programme.desc: This two-year film project features the world’s best female snowboarders. It pays tribute to the history of women's snowboarding and showcases how it has influenced and encouraged the current state of the sport.
programme.series-desc: Women's snowboarding is in the spotlight in a tribute to the athletes who've made the sport what it is today.

programme.title: Liquid Science
programme.desc: American rapper GZA travels to UCLA and Radiant Images in Los Angeles, United States. Both organisations use virtual reality to augment surgery and media. Later he creates his own virtual avatar at the University of Southern California.
programme.series-desc: Host GZA explores virtual reality at universities in California, United States.

programme.title: Drop Everything
programme.desc: With tongues firmly in cheeks, Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to the passion behind slope-side action. Sit back and enjoy stunning scenery, awesome tricks from world-class skiers and belly-laughing comedy.
programme.series-desc: Matchstick Productions present a light-hearted approach to slope-side action, featuring world-class skiers.

programme.title: MX World
programme.desc: Tom Vialle is the newest member of the Red Bull KTM Factory Racing team. Learn the story of how his family are sharing in his dream for MXGP glory.
programme.series-desc: Learn the story of how Tom Vialle's family are sharing in his dream for MXGP glory.

programme.title: Iron to the Core
programme.desc: Decorated long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete. From preparation to race day, it's a life spent enduring gruelling trials, but every small success makes the arduous journey worth it.
programme.series-desc: Long-distance triathlete Sebastian Kienle gives an inside look at what it takes to be an IRONMAN athlete.

programme.title: Motorkite Dreaming
programme.desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an ambitious adventure across Australia with a pair of modest microlight aircrafts. Accompanied by their fiancées, Lexi and Elsie, and a local guide, Bart, they fly to their first stop: Wardang Island.
programme.series-desc: Aiden Glasby and Daryl Clarke embark on an adventure across Australia with modest microlight equipment.

programme.title: In House
programme.desc: Volcom Pipe Pro continues with some bigger names taking their turn. Follow Ian Walsh, Jamie O'Brien and Adriano de Souza, among others, as they take on the legendary Pipeline in Oahu, Hawaii, each of them wanting that victory more than anything.
programme.series-desc: Follow the journeys of the world's greatest surfers as they take on Hawaii's legendary Banzai Pipeline.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd SE6
programme.desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe makes his way to one of the top locations to visit in South America – Medellin, Colombia. He digs into the history and the way this city has transformed in recent years.
programme.series-desc: Hubertus von Hohenlohe discovers the historic and cultural treasures of Medellin, Colombia.

programme.title: I am the Engine
programme.desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table e-commerce platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it. This builds bonds between farmers and the people who eat their crops.
programme.series-desc: Raízs is a farm-to-table platform that connects consumers to healthier food and the people who grow it.

programme.title: I am the Engine
programme.desc: An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope. Homeboy Industries allows people a chance to go from “shedding blood to baking bread”.
programme.series-desc: An organisation in Los Angeles is transforming the lives of former gang members through community and hope.

programme.title: Keep Your Tips Up
programme.desc: Sean and Callum Pettit, and snowboarders Eric and John Jackson take advantage of Whistler’s epic springtime powder. Back in town, the boys rip it up in the skate park by day while Groovemeister hops in the wresting ring by night.
programme.series-desc: It’s springtime in Canada, and the Pettit bros are taking full advantage of Whistler’s epic conditions.

programme.title: Keep Your Tips Up
programme.desc: Sean sets the scene for his ambitious new skiing concept at the Revelstoke Mountain Resort in British Columbia, Canada. It’s a project full of never-before-seen features, top skiing talent, and epic explosions taken straight from an action film.
programme.series-desc: Keep Your Tips Up S2E7

programme.title: Escape. Create.
programme.desc: Something of a creative genius, mountain biker Dan Atherton designs intense, difficult trails for himself and his brother Gee, and sister Rachel. Watch as they perform amazing tricks on Dan's highly technical courses.
programme.series-desc: Dan Atherton designs intense BMX trails for himself and his sibling, brother Gee and sister Rachel.

programme.title: Finding the Line
programme.sub-title: A heartfelt journey on the edge of big mountains
programme.desc: Olympian and X Games Slopestyle champion Anna Segal and her Freeride World Tour, big mountain skiing sister, Nat Segal, use their skiing to understand fear and how it manifests in their lives.
programme.series-desc: Anna Segal and Nat Segal use their skiing to understand fear and how it manifests in their lives.

programme.title: Let's Get It Wright
programme.desc: After winning the Phoenix Am, Red Bull's Zion Wright became a national name in skateboarding. Zion returns home to Jupiter, Florida, United States, to spend time with his family and prep for the upcoming Tampa Am.
programme.series-desc: Skateboarder Zion Wright returns home to Jupiter, Florida, USA, for some family time and competition prep.

programme.sub-title: From a hotel to a yurt
programme.desc: A group of skateboarders travel to Uzbekistan seeking adventure, from jumping into rivers, to getting familiar with the local metro and finding undiscovered skate spots the country has to offer.

programme.title: MX World
programme.desc: Toni Cairoli feels the pressure as he prepares to race in his home country. With Tim Gaiser's homeland right over the border in Slovenia he also wants the win at the Trentino race.
programme.series-desc: Toni Cairoli feels the pressure as he prepares to race in his home country at the competition in Trentino.

programme.title: Hubertusjagd SE6

programme.title: Fandom
programme.desc: Christian Slater narrates a look inside the fantasy football phenomenon, boasting more than 35 million players. From local leagues to high stakes challenges, fantasy football has transformed from a once-modest fan activity into a lucrative industry.
programme.series-desc: Christian Slater narrates a look inside the massive phenomenon of fantasy football.

programme.title: Dakar Decoded
programme.sub-title: A look at the SxS and Quads category
programme.desc: Take a look at the newest category of Dakar Rally, SxS and Quads, and the unveiling of the Red Bull team's OT3 which has been test driven by Dakar legends Nasser Al-Attiyah and Cyril Despres.
programme.series-desc: Take a look at the newest category of Dakar Rally, SxS and Quads, and the unveiling of Red Bull team's OT3.

programme.title: Dakar Decoded
programme.sub-title: A look at the Truck category
programme.desc: Take a look at the Truck category of Dakar Rally featuring, of course, the legendary Russian Kamaz trucks. These monstrous vehicles can wrestle over even the toughest of terrains.
programme.series-desc: Take a look at the Truck category of Dakar Rally featuring, of course, the legendary Russian Kamaz trucks.

programme.title: Dakar Decoded
programme.desc: After races in Europe, Africa and South America, Dakar heads to the Middle East for the next five years. Drivers and riders are looking towards the new challenges.
programme.series-desc: After races in Europe, Africa and South America, Dakar heads to the Middle East for the next five years.
